LanguageData.LongRangeMineralScanner.label: Long-Range Scanner
LanguageData.LongRangeMineralScanner.description: A lateral sensor unit used by researchers to detect resources across the planet. Scanning speed depends on the operator's research ability. This sensor can be tuned to specific resource types, and with further research may also find certain points of interest. It consumes a lot of electricity. If you find a resource, you'll have to travel to collect it.
